title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 148 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 148 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
lineList.cn: 你们要赞美耶和华，从天上赞美耶和华，在高处赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
lineList.cn: 他的众使者都要赞美他。他的诸军都要赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
lineList.cn: 日头月亮，你们要赞美他。放光的星宿，你们都要赞美他。

lineList.en: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
lineList.cn: 天上的天，和天上的水，你们都要赞美他。

lineList.en: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
lineList.cn: 愿这些都赞美耶和华的名。因他一吩咐便都造成。

lineList.en: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.
lineList.cn: 他将这些立定，直到永永远远。他定了命，不能废去（或作越过）。

lineList.en: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
lineList.cn: 所有在地上的，大鱼和一切深洋，

lineList.en: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapours; stormy wind fulfilling his word:
lineList.cn: 火与冰雹，雪和雾气，成就他命的狂风，

lineList.en: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:
lineList.cn: 大山和小山，结果的树木，和一切香柏树，

lineList.en: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:
lineList.cn: 野兽和一切牲畜，昆虫和飞鸟，

lineList.en: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:
lineList.cn: 世上的君王和万民，首领和世上一切审判官，

lineList.en: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:
lineList.cn: 少年人和处女，老年人和孩童，都当赞美耶和华。

lineList.en: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
lineList.cn: 愿这些都赞美耶和华的名。因为独有他的名被尊崇。他的荣耀在天地之上。

lineList.en: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
lineList.cn: 他将他百姓的角高举，因此他（因此他或作他使）一切圣民以色列人，就是与他相近的百姓，都赞美他。你们要赞美耶和华。
